That's an arguably valid point, but it becomes irrelevant by virtue of the fact that Hillary Clinton shouldn't even be ELIGIBLE to be president because of the things she's said and done. She's been documented by the FBI as a liar (which you still won't address), and she's been documented by the FBI as a national security risk. That's pretty freakin' important. If congress could find two testicles among themselves, when they were questioning James Comey about her crimes, they should have asked him, point blank, """"If this person applied for a position with the Federal Bureau of Investigation, would you hire her?"""" And Comey would've had to say """"No."""" if he had a shred of respect for the concept of being under oath. Then their next logical question should've been, """"Why not?"""" And Comey's reply would've had to be, """"Because with her record, she couldn't possibly pass a background/security check to be hired."""" So, half the country is okay with putting this person in charge of government agencies that she couldn't even possibly get hired to work for because of her background. That's unbelievable!!! And please...spare me the """"she's more qualified"""" narrative. It lacks integrity. John McCain was a thousand times more qualified than Barack Obama. So was Mitt Romney. You wouldn't have voted for either of them.

I like you David, but you are way out in left field. Did you read his book """"Dreams from my Father"""". ? It would give you a little more insight into who he is. He is an intelligent and classy man. He and Michelle have a sense of humor. He is passionate about his beliefs. He is a good man. He is human. I am a little surprised by your comments. What are your thoughts on Trump? I hope that you rethink!!

What are ya'll afraid of? The Little Transgender boys and girls aren't going to attack your precious future bigots. Your children probably could care less about their classmates using the bathroom. As usual the Parents and our government officials are making this a bigger deal than it should be. But History says you always rebel against things that make you feel uncomfortable. A large majority of your grandparents spit on and attacked black children for having the nerve to try and go to school with your parents, and when the dust settled, you lost that battle, as you will lose this one and the world didn't end. These are children, not Rapist, or Pedolphiles.
